categories: Category:Cut content from Star Wars Adventure Journal 17

nodes.text: The LD5 Land Speeder was manufactured by Ubrikkian Repulsorlift Manufacturing. A light duty land speeder, it was perfect for patrol duty and could seat six beings. It carried a twin blaster cannon mounted on the rear deck.

At least 1 was stationed at the Imperial supply base Zonith Field during the early part of the Galactic Civil War. ISB Captain Edmond Mylesgood used an LD5 to engage a team of Rebel Alliance Spec Force troopers. It was then taken by the team to escape after they subdued the Captain.
The LD5 Land Speeder appears in the article "Special Ops: The Art of Infiltration" in West End Games' canceled magazine Star Wars Adventure Journal 17.
